notIOS.title: Access from iPhone
notIOS.description: This installation guide is designed for iOS devices (iPhone/iPad).
notIOS.hint: Please open this link on your iPhone using Safari to install the app.

inAppBrowser.title: In-App Browser Detected
inAppBrowser.description: You're using {{browser}}. PWA installation requires Safari.
inAppBrowser.step1: Tap the menu button (•••) at the top or bottom
inAppBrowser.step2: Select "Open in Safari" or "Open in Browser"

notSafari.title: Safari Required
notSafari.description: PWA installation on iOS requires Safari browser. You're currently using {{browser}}.
notSafari.step1: Copy this page's URL or share it to Safari

safari.description: Install Stakly on your iPhone for a better experience - faster, works offline, and feels like a native app!

step1.title: 1. Tap the Share button
step1.description: Look for the share icon in Safari's bottom toolbar

step2.title: 2. Select "Add to Home Screen"
step2.description: Scroll down in the menu and tap the option

step3.title: 3. Tap "Add"
step3.description: Tap "Add" in the top right corner to confirm. The app will appear on your home screen!

safari.tip: After installation, open Stakly from your home screen for the best experience - it will work just like a native app!
